Keyno:

well I think the manual should give more information about that..it just says 'compatibe with France VFR bla bla bla'..not really the fault of the guy who ripped this I think

FSSR.Keyno: Just FYI, I've installed both of these and used them with no problems. I can't, however, tell you what other add-ons I had active at the time. I've been using only N. American sceneries for the last 6 months or so, and I've forgotten what all I have installed on my Euro scenery.cfg.
SK

... also, I obtained these as-is from TPB over the last year. Rest assured that whenever I am aware of any combatibility/issue info. on one of my uploads, I will always include it either in the archive as a readme or in the download header.
SK
Like I said... once a pirate, alwayz a pirate ReDnaX! ;-)

i have the same issue as FSSR.Keyno. fs usually freezes at 11%, just when im loading in france. i have all france vfr packs. but if im change the loading order of FRVFR packs in scenery library it will work for a short period. then its freezes at 11% again. then i must play with loading order again, and it will work for a short time again.

Thanx 4 the up, Steve

but:
...   how exactly do we install this shit? You copied the link from a well known site, made a torrent and now what?

no readme, no nothing's...  

any suggestions on how to get this stuff running?

C'mon! U posted it, what's the story?
